title: UFC : leading fighter earning totals as of May 2019
yAxis: Total earnings in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Total earnings in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Total earnings in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Conor McGregor and lowest at Month Frank Mir.
The difference of Total earnings in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 8.51.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Total earnings in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Total earnings in million U.S. dollars 12.02 is found at Month Conor McGregor and the minimum is found at Frank Mir where Month is 3.51.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Total earnings in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Total earnings in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Conor McGregor and lowest at Month Frank Mir.
The difference of Total earnings in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 8.51.
max_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Total earnings in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Total earnings in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month Conor McGregor and lowest at Month Frank Mir.
Month Conor McGregor has 3.42 times more Total earnings in million U.S. dollars than Month Frank Mir which is has the lowest.
The Month Conor McGregor has the highest Total earnings in million U.S. dollars, followed by Alistair Overeem, and Anderson Silva. Down to the Month Frank Mir which is the lowest.
Overall Total earnings in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Months.
Month Stipe Miocic, and Chris Weidman have a similar Total earnings in million U.S. dollars that is 3.65.
The Month Frank Mir has 2.32 times less Total earnings in million U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 155.34.
